attributes.action: Implement personal accountability for failure to deliver reliable train services
attributes.background: Rail2020 promised huge improvement Instead it has caused rail services to implode. Thameslink and Great Nothern have destroyed the commuter link to London. The public demand rapid action to remediate. Rail is critical national infrastructure. Senior management must be removed from post for failing.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Implement personal accountability for failure to deliver reliable train services".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
